name: Jump Among Stars
description:
Jump Among Stars is a challenging 3D platform game where you will face a series of escalating challenges. Each level is a thrilling adventure through an intergalactic portal to a new star system to race to the center, collect energy from the stars and return it to the space station.

You will need to master precision jumps, calculate the correct time, face platforms with different mechanics and find the correct path in the most diverse star systems

The player is Lieutenant Thrina Torres of the MD-P9 troop and together with soldier Rilke H. Kenze travel to the abandoned space station Phoenix Beta 3 of the interspace organization HiperPortal to recover a capsule with the energy of a rare star.


In Jump Among Stars the player needs to explore the Phoenix Beta 3 space station, accessing different rooms after collecting star energy. For this, the player needs to travel by teleportation to a star system, reach the main star, collect the energy...



...and reach the teleport again to return to the station.



Each star system has a unique challenge, beautifully crafted with different platforming mechanics and challenges



While facing the 3D platforming challenges, the player can also enjoy stunningly beautiful intergalactic landscapes.

The game contains

  • Space scenery
  • Challenges with 3D platforms
  • Different environments and scenarios to explore
  • Linear progression
  • Third-person character
  • Stories and secrets to discover
  • Immersive soundtrack
  • Beautiful 3D artwork
